name: Jug Wine and Good Herb
description:
Antifascist power fantasy and/or comedic satire...? RPG elements and strategy. It's a story about five friends who have to kill a bunch of brigands masquerading as cops.

Includes multiple difficulty modes: a Story Mode for people who want to enjoy the story without too much challenge, and a Normal Mode for fans of the Fire Emblem series who want to solve annoying survival puzzles.

I've only finished one chapter so far, so please don't give me too much money.

Made with SRPG Studio.
